Domino]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Great Smials]], [[Tuckborough]] | affiliation= | language= | birth=between {{SR|1232}} and {{SR|1238|n}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Took Family|Took]] | parentage=[[Gerontius Took]] and [[Adamanta Chubb]] | siblings=[[Isengrim Took III|Isengrim]], [[Isumbras Took IV|Isumbras]], [[Hildigrim Took|Hildigrim]], [[Isembold Took|Isembold]], [[Hildifons Took|Hildifons]], [[Isembard Took|Isembard]], [[Hildibrand Took|Hildibrand]], [[Belladonna Took|Belladonna]], [[Donnamira Took|Donnamira]], [[Mirabella Took|Mirabella]] and [[Isengar Took|Isengar]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Unknown | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Hildigard Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Hildigard was the second child of [[Gerontius Took|the Old Took]] and [[Adamanta Chubb]]. Hildigard died at a young age.{{App|Took}} ==Etymology== "Hildigard" come from the Germanic roots ''hild'' meaning "battle" and ''gard'' meaning "protection".{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names" The hobbit's gender is not mentioned ({{HM|Guide}} for example treats Hildigard as a male hobbit), however [[Wikipedia:Hildegard|Hildegard]] is a Germanic female name. ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | FOO | | | | | | | | | FOO=[[Fortinbras Took I|Fortinbras I]]
